response.original_title: TR speaking to a group of suffragettes from the porch at Sagamore Hill [1917]
response.overview: TR addresses a group of men and women at the opening of the second New York State suffrage campaign on Sept. 8, 1917 at Sagamore Hill. Film includes a side view of TR and a frontal view shot from the rear of the crowd. A woman and a man appear on the porch behind TR; immediately in front of the porch, a man who may be a reporter, takes notes.
response.title: TR speaking to a group of suffragettes from the porch at Sagamore Hill [1917]

titles.title: Theodore Roosevelt speaking to a group of suffragettes from the porch at Sagamore Hill, 1917
